# Business Development Performance Dashboard

A Streamlit dashboard for analyzing business development and marketing performance metrics with MySQL database integration.

- ðŸ“Š **Interactive Dashboard**: Real-time data visualization

- ðŸ“ˆ **Period Analysis**: Monthly, weekly, and 7-day rolling periods

## Setup Instructions

### 1. Prerequisites
- Python 3.8+
- MySQL Database
- Git

### 2. Clone the Repository
```bash
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/business-development-dashboard.git
cd business-development-dashboard
